ResyncNewsArticles.Title: Tabs content resync
ResyncNewsArticles.Description: When you click on the button below, news articles belonging to this business profile will be deleted and resynced.
ResyncNewsArticles.ConfirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to resync news articles for this business profile?
ResyncNewsArticles.Progress: Resyncing news articles for this business profile is in progress
ResyncNewsArticles.ResyncIsProcessingItCanTakeSomeTimeToFin: Resync is processing, it may take some time to finish.

ResyncUsers.Title: Users resync
ResyncUsers.SyncAllUsersDescription: Resync all available users in the tenant. This will sync every user with all new data.

Dialog.MessageResyncUsers: Do you want to resync these users?
Dialog.MessageResyncAllUsers: Do you want to resync all users in the tenant? This may take some time to complete.

AzureIntune.Title: Omnia Feed Azure Intune
AzureIntune.Description: Enable using Azure Intune with the Omnia Feed app.
